Description: The 416 is a well-built German assaut rifle. A solid weapon best used for ranged fighting.
The 417 is a German-made semi-automatic assault rifle. Its impressive accuracy and penetration make it well-suited for ranged combat.

Name: AK-47
Description: The AK-47 is known for its durability and simplicity. This Russian workhorse is great for medium-range encounters and offes solid penetration.
